main event: On July 6, 1968, a witness observed a bright, oval-shaped object in the sky over Southampton, New York.
interesting points: The object was described as approximately 20 feet in diameter and emitting a bright, white light.,The object was moving slowly in a westerly direction at around 300 to 400 feet in the air.,The witness observed the object for 1 to 2 minutes before it disappeared from view.,No other witnesses could corroborate the observation.,The sighting occurred under clear weather conditions with no physical evidence found.
sighted object: bright, oval-shaped object emitting white light
witness description: The witness saw the object while looking out the window of his residence.
